title: Balliceaux
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has clearly marked vegan choices in small plates, salads, soup, sandwiches, and entrees. Gluten free clearly marked on menus, also. Has a modern stylish vibe. In addition, is a music venue and has a full bar. Open Mon-Sat 5pm-close and Sun Brunch 10:30am-2:30pm.
